project.description: Custom job which can be triggered at any instant of time. It does shallow clone, builds Harvester, installs VECTORCAST in shared/.VCAST_REGRESSION/custom

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
call "C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0\VC\vcvarsall.bat"
cd %WORKSPACE% set path=%path:"=% rem set VECTORCAST_DIR=N:\shared\.VCAST_REGRESSION\vcinst\windows\install set VECTORCAST_DIR=N:\shared\.VCAST_REGRESSION\custom\VCAST_WINDOWS set VECTOR_LICENSE_FILE=C:\flexlm\vector-INDIAWINDOWSBUI.lic set PYTHONPATH=C:\Python27\Lib\site-packages\junit_xml-1.0-py2.7.egg
rem xcopy /S /I /E %WIN_GIT_DIR%\tests tests /Q /Y xcopy /S /I /E V:\Harvester\tests tests /Q /Y
rem set _VC_DETOUR_CYGWIN_32_=1 echo %_VC_DETOUR_CYGWIN_32_%
%VECTORCAST_DIR%\vcshell --version %VECTORCAST_DIR%\clicast --version
cd %WORKSPACE% rmdir tbuild32_cyg /s /q mkdir tbuild32_cyg cd tbuild32_cyg set PATH=C:\cygwin\bin;%PATH% bash -c "cmake ../tests -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=gcc -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=g++" cd CompatibilityTest %VECTORCAST_DIR%\vpython ..\VcRunTests.py
